name: Pocket Creatures
description:
HOW TO PLAY: Use wasd to move around the over world. Walking into tall grass has a chance to bring you into a random encounter with an enemy monster. Obtain runes and exp from defeating monsters to  grow the strength of your monster. On the far east side of the island is the legendary fire worm monster which you can test.

Authors:

Chris Tulip: Item System,  Menu/UI,  Loot/Reward System,

Kyle Hunter: Encounter/Battle system, Overworld Controls, Abilities and Creature Design.
